nodes.text: Jaadel the Vindicator was a male Cathar Jedi living during or after the Cold War.

Jaadel the Vindicator was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever Light side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Jaadel the Vindicator has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Hoth alongside other Light Side World Bosses. Though killing him is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible the year when him death took place.
